title: EatEase
description: Led development of a food delivery system using SQL and NetBeans. Improved order management and streamlined the food delivery process.

title: Blocky Blitz
description: Developed an interactive game using JavaFX with modular, reusable code and multiple levels, boosting user engagement.

title: CAMS
description: CAMS (formerly ConsultEase) is a user-friendly web platform that helps academic institutions manage and track faculty consultancy projects with industry partners.

title: Dots and Connect
description: A digital version of the classic dots and boxes game with multiplayer support and real-time scoring.
